entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
